explanation: [0-0] In an indoor scene, a little girl wearing a white top and gray pants stands with her back to the front. There is a bed on the left, a mahogany table with a fan on it, and a pile of sundries on the right, which are packed in woven bags. A red plastic stool is placed to the left of the sundries.

[0-3] First, the little girl in white walks to the table on the left, holding a yellow toy in her hand. The pile of sundries on the right is moved to the right, revealing a green train. The front of the train is an exaggerated green cartoon virus. The green train drives forward along the track.

[3-9] Then the green train stops moving forward, its door stops on the right side of the little girl in white, and the door opens. The little girl in white looks up to the right. A lady with long hair wearing blue jeans gets off the train with a black suitcase, walks to the little girl in white, and faces her back to the front. The lady bends down, puts her hands under the little girl's armpits, stands up and lifts the little girl off the ground. The green train on the right drives forward, restoring the room to its original state.
